import React, { lazy,useContext,useEffect } from 'react' import { CBadge, CButton, CButtonGroup, CCard, CCardBody, CCardFooter, CCardHeader, CCol, CProgress, CRow, CCallout } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' import ArticleProvider from "../../context/ArticleContext" import Paginations from "../../pagination/pagination" import SearchInput from "../../inputs/search-input" import LoginModal from '../../modals/login-modal' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faTrash} from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import MainChartExample from '../charts/MainChartExample.js' const styles={ noBorder:{ border:"none" }, noBorderTop:{ borderBTop:"none" }, cardStyle:{ boxShadow: " 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2)", transition: "0.3s", border:"none" } } const Dashboard = () => { const {fetching,fetchingFailMsg,setCurrentPage,articles,fetchArticlesApi,pagination,fetchArticleByIdApi,resetEditArticle,resetArticle,setEditMode,setArticle,setCurrentArticle,editMode,selectedImageEn,selectedImageFr,validateArticle,toast,modal,setModal,setToast,article,updateArticle}=useContext(ArticleProvider.Context) useEffect(()=>{ fetchArticlesApi() setCurrentPage(1) //alert("mount") },[]) return ( <> All Posts | Showing Page {articles.length ? pagination.from:""}-{articles.length ? pagination.to:""} of {articles.length ? pagination.total: "" } Results { articles.length ? articles.map((post)=>( )):null }
Title Status Category Type Trash
{post.title_en}
Edit | Posted: {post.created_at}
{post.status}
{post.category}
alert(post.id)} icon={faTrash} />
